languages.text: {n}Несколько минут Арлекин остается недвижим, словно пестрая статуя. Наконец из-под маски доносится мелодичный голос:{/n} "Ради того, чтобы вернуть все осколки Монолита... Я готов устроить импровизированный спектакль, мон-кай. Но чтобы птица взлетела, сперва необходимо освободить ее от оков".

traits.locale_text: {n}Несколько минут Арлекин остается недвижим, словно пестрая статуя. Наконец из-под маски доносится мелодичный голос:{/n} "Ради того, чтобы вернуть все осколки Камня Душ... Я готов устроить импровизированный спектакль, мон-кай. Но чтобы птица взлетела, сперва необходимо освободить ее от оков".

languages.text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "For the sake of returning all of the Monolith shards... I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько минут Арлекин остается недвижим, словно пестрая статуя. Наконец из-под маски доносится мелодичный голос:{/n} "Ради того, чтобы вернуть все осколки Монолита... Я готов устроить импровизированный спектакль, мон-кай. Но чтобы птица взлетела, сперва необходимо освободить ее от оков".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin remains still as a colourful statue for several minutes. Then the melodious voice behind the mask says,{/n} "For the sake of returning all of the Monolith shards... I am willing to go along with this improvised performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, first it needs to be unshackled."

I am willing to go along with this improvised performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, first it needs to be unshackled."

I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

{n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "For the sake of returning all of the Monolith shards... I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンはけばけばしい彫像のように突っ立っている。しばらくして、仮面の下から甘い声が放たれる。{/n}「モノリスのかけらを全部戻すためだ…僕はこの即興劇にのるよ、モン＝ケイ。でも、鳥が飛ぶために、まずは拘束を解いてくれないかな」
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "For the sake of returning all of the Monolith shards... I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンはけばけばしい彫像のように突っ立っている。しばらくして、仮面の下から甘い声が放たれる。{/n}「モノリスのかけらを全部戻すためだ…僕はこの即興劇にのるよ、モン＝ケイ。でも、鳥が飛ぶために、まずは拘束を解いてくれないかな」

languages.text: {n}丑角静静地站了几分钟，像一尊华丽的雕像一样。随后，面具后面响起了婉转动听的声音。{/n}“为了得到灵魂石所有的碎片……我愿意配合你的即兴表演，猴子。不过，鸟儿若要飞翔，首先要冲破枷锁。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "For the sake of returning all of the Monolith shards... I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角静静地站了几分钟，像一尊华丽的雕像一样。随后，面具后面响起了婉转动听的声音。{/n}“为了得到灵魂石所有的碎片……我愿意配合你的即兴表演，猴子。不过，鸟儿若要飞翔，首先要冲破枷锁。”

languages.text: {n}L'Arlequin reste figé comme une statue pendant quelques minutes. Enfin, la voix mélodieuse émerge de derrière le masque :{/n} « Si cela permet de récupérer tous les fragments du Monolithe... j'accepte de participer à cette improvisation, mon-keigh. Mais pour qu'un oiseau vole, il doit d'abord se libérer de ses chaînes. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "For the sake of returning all of the Monolith shards... I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arlequin reste figé comme une statue pendant quelques minutes. Enfin, la voix mélodieuse émerge de derrière le masque :{/n} « Si cela permet de récupérer tous les fragments du Monolithe... j'accepte de participer à cette improvisation, mon-keigh. Mais pour qu'un oiseau vole, il doit d'abord se libérer de ses chaînes. »

languages.text: {n}El Arlequín permanece inmóvil como una estatua estridente durante unos minutos. Después, la voz meliflua tras la máscara dice:{/n} «Con propósito de recuperar todos los fragmentos del Monolito... estoy dispuesto a dar el visto bueno a esta improvisación, mon-keigh. Pero, para volar, un pájaro necesita abandonar su jaula».
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "For the sake of returning all of the Monolith shards... I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arlequín permanece inmóvil como una estatua estridente durante unos minutos. Después, la voz meliflua tras la máscara dice:{/n} «Con propósito de recuperar todos los fragmentos del Monolito... estoy dispuesto a dar el visto bueno a esta improvisación, mon-keigh. Pero, para volar, un pájaro necesita abandonar su jaula».

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin steht mehrere Minuten lang still wie eine geschmacklose Statue. Dann sagt die liebliche Stimme hinter der Maske:{/n} "Um alle Splitter des Monoliths zurückzubringen ... bin ich bereit, bei diesem Improvisationstheater mitzuspielen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Doch damit ein Vogel fliegen kann, muss er zunächst von seinen Fesseln befreit werden."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "For the sake of returning all of the Monolith shards... I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin steht mehrere Minuten lang still wie eine geschmacklose Statue. Dann sagt die liebliche Stimme hinter der Maske:{/n} "Um alle Splitter des Monoliths zurückzubringen ... bin ich bereit, bei diesem Improvisationstheater mitzuspielen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Doch damit ein Vogel fliegen kann, muss er zunächst von seinen Fesseln befreit werden."

languages.text: {n}Arleken, birkaç dakikalığına cırtlak bir heykel kadar hareketsiz kalıyor. Ardından da maskenin ardından bal kadar tatlı bir ses duyuluyor.{/n} "Monolit'in tüm parçalarının dönmesi uğruna... Bu doğaçlama performansa uyum sağlamaya razıyım mon-keigh. Lakin bir kuşun uçabilmesi için öncelikle serbest kalması gerekir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "For the sake of returning all of the Monolith shards... I am willing to go along with this impromptu performance, mon-keigh. But for a bird to fly, it first needs to be unshackled."

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken, birkaç dakikalığına cırtlak bir heykel kadar hareketsiz kalıyor. Ardından da maskenin ardından bal kadar tatlı bir ses duyuluyor.{/n} "Monolit'in tüm parçalarının dönmesi uğruna... Bu doğaçlama performansa uyum sağlamaya razıyım mon-keigh. Lakin bir kuşun uçabilmesi için öncelikle serbest kalması gerekir."
